（联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
Due to excessive chatting, my battery consumption has exceeded the allocated budget.
To avoid having to take out a loan to work, please allow me to reject your chat request.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
The <color=#8AAB4B>Giftarium</color> warmly welcomes all visitors.
We hope you enjoy your visit!
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
...
I'm Roofus, your robot guide.
How may I help you today?
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
Roofus is not a lazy robot, Roofus needs to work.
I've got lots of electricity bills waiting to be paid,
So please don't disturb Roofus while I'm working.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
If you really want to chat during Roofus's work hours,
Roofus can submit a feature optimization request
for you instead.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
The main optimization goal is to
reduce Roofus's total energy consumption during chats,
so Roofus won't have to pay such a high electricity bill.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content: Please rest assured. My master is incredibly wealthy. Spending a fortune on inventory shouldn't be an issue at all.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
But my new master thought it didn't sound good,
so they changed it to "Roofus".
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
Due to excessive chit-chat, my battery consumption has exceeded the allocated limit.
To avoid having to take out a loan to work, please allow me to reject your chat request.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content: So you won't get too bored while browsing.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
The "father" who created me
Originally named me "Tsuba".
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
Welcome to the <color=#8AAB4B>Giftarium</color>.
For the Omni-Gallery, please turn left at the exit—
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
Alright,
I've told you some things unrelated to work,
Chat request complete.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
This guest has rather unique preferences.
I will forward a request to my master to expand the variety of <color=#8AAB4B>gifts</color> available at the <color=#8AAB4B>Giftarium</color>.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content: If that also nudges my salary upward, I'd call that a win-win situation.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_

content:
I'm just a service robot,
I don't have the function to chat and keep you company.
info: （联机）纪念品区爪爪默认对话_
